title: Le Théâtre de B
original_name: LE THÉÂTRE DE B ～ B の劇場～
sinopse:
A collection of Nakamura Asumiko's works previously published in Gothic & Lolita Bible, compiled in a hardback, all-color volume.

1. Noël
2. Yonshimai Satsujin Jiken
3. Teddy Bear Satsujin Jiken
4. A is for Alice A
5. Shindai no Musume Atelier no Musme (The Bedroom Girl, The Sculpture Room Girl)
6. B&W: Black&White
7. Le Jardin du thé
   8-9. Free Fitting for Her
8. Rose Dusk, Pale Moon
9. Hello, My Sister
10. The Happy Prince
11. Welcome to Wonderland
